revised_title: Erratum: Molecular and Morphological Evolution within Small Islands
tldr: This article is an erratum for a previous publication in the Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. It corrects a figure on page 817 that had incorrect symbols. The original article discussed molecular and morphological evolution within small islands, focusing on Anolis lizards and their habitat in Dominica.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
